item.description:
Olde School Saloon and Bistro will be holding a Halloween Party on Sunday!

Party starts at 6 PM

If you come in costume there may be a prize in it for you, but come either way!

Olde School plans to have a DJ and Karaoke to Liven up any Ghosts and Ghouls whom attend.

Stacey intends to go along with a few other sizable meetup groups in the area and would be happy to meet you there.  She will host this meetup and post how to find her there as the date approaches.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for your Listed Hosts, whom will post additional info.
item.name: Olde School Halloween Party
